title: Community Art Workshop
description: Join us for a day of creativity and fun in our Community Art Workshop. Suitable for all ages and skill levels.

title: Tech for Seniors Seminar
description: A seminar aimed at helping seniors become more tech-savvy. Covering basics like email, internet safety, and more.

title: Youth Soccer Camp
description: A week-long soccer camp for youths aged 8-14. Focusing on teamwork, skills training, and healthy living.

title: Summer Music Festival
description: Our annual music festival featuring local bands, food vendors, and activities for the whole family.

title: Gardening for Beginners
description: Learn the basics of gardening in this introductory workshop. Topics include planting, soil health, and garden maintenance.
